files.patch: @@ -2813,0 +2813,7 @@ + if (key == CSS.Attribute.FONT_SIZE && !isDefined(key)) { + // CSS.FontSize represents a specified value and we need + // to inherit a computed value so don't resolve percentage + // value from parent. + return FONT_SIZE_INHERIT; + } + @@ -3409,0 +3416,9 @@ + /** + * Proxy value to compute inherited {@code font-size}. + * + * @see Assigning + * property values, Cascading, and Inheritance + */ + static final Object FONT_SIZE_INHERIT = + new CSS().new FontSize().parseCssValue("100%"); +
